slides.title: CodeGuardian
slides.subtitle: Multi-model AI code review with 0-100 quality scoring
slides.tagline: Every PR reviewed. Every vulnerability caught. Zero human bottleneck.

slides.heading: The Problem
slides.statement: Code review is the biggest bottleneck in software delivery
points: Senior engineers spend 6+ hours/week reviewing code — time not spent building
Review quality is inconsistent — fatigue, context-switching, and bias affect results
Security vulnerabilities slip through — no reviewer catches everything every time
Single-model AI tools miss nuance — one model can't excel at logic, security, and style

slides.heading: The Solution
slides.statement: Route each review check to the best AI model for that specific task
points: Multi-model ensemble — Claude Opus for logic, GPT-4o for security, Gemini for patterns
GitHub-native reviews — inline comments that look and feel like human reviews
0-100 quality score — transparent breakdown across security, logic, performance, style
One-click GitHub Marketplace install — working in 60 seconds
